ygData.subject: Re: New instrument?!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not on Tarrew Marr. I haven t been playing lately (what s there to do for a L49 bard?) but I dropped in on the weekend to chat with friends and heard one
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Sep 02/99, "J.R. Hyde" <jr@...> wrote:
>
> All this was prenerf btw, we cant even kill one mob now in the fear plane.
> Has any server even managed to kill one mob in the fear plane since it was
> nerfed?
>

Not on Tarrew Marr. I haven't been playing lately (what's there to do
for a L49 bard?) but I dropped in on the weekend to chat with friends
and heard one particularly depressing story.

18 people went to PoF on Tarrew last week to try to do some adventuring.
Within 5 minutes they were all dead. It took 9 hours for some of them to
get their bodies back. Some of them never did and have quit the game.
Others, in frustration, allowed themselves to die until they were
knocked back to L45, at which time they were able to get their bodies
retrieved for them by a GM as they were unable to enter the PoF anymore.

Of the 20+ people I used to adventure with regularly on Tarrew Marr, 3
were logged in on Saturday as their L50 characters. The rest may have
been on as alternates, though the ones I know the names of definately
weren't. Of the Bard's I know on the server, several have left the game
at L48-49 without even bothering to get 50.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
